Notes.Text:
This update for jasper fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-31744: Fixed denial of service through assertion failure in jpc_streamlist_remove() (bsc#1223155).

Vulnerabilities.Description: In Jasper 4.2.2, the jpc_streamlist_remove function in src/libjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c:2407 has an assertion failure vulnerability, allowing attackers to cause a denial of service attack through a specific image file.
